AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States of America: appellant in a criminal case and the government seeking review
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.district court: court that made the judgment of acquittal in favor of Raul Rafael Arce-Jasso and the court from which the appeal is taken
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.court of appeals: court to which the United States of America must appeal from a decision or order of a district court suppressing or excluding evidence
